item.name: State of pCO clock (0: Disabled or not present; 1: Enabled)
Enable High/Low Temp. to Turn on All Devices (0=NO, 1=YES)
Number of Communication Errors from pCOId1 to pCOWeb
item.description: You will have how many pCOIdX-ErrorsNumber objects as the pCOs connected to pCOWeb.

item.name: Status of pCOId1. 0=Offline, 1=Init, 2=Online
item.description: You will have how many pCOIdX-Status objects as the pCOs connected to pCOWeb.
